values:
i used to know
what it was like
to believe in some one.
to know, tomorrow
will never be a lie.
-
i continue to wonder if
i ever truly loved or
if i forgot
how. when
i was a child
but then again, who
is there to teach?
-
on the days
where the rain
is falling, drowning
the roads
and you don't know 
which direction to go
i'll show you the star
north is the direction
of home
but this heart keeps stalling
holding me back
again
and again
and i've lost the sound
of your voice
this time.
-
and i think, just maybe
along the way
you tossed this heart
but kept the key
in memory of me
and
sun will rise, and sun will set
but in the end
you may forget
and you'll watch winters
first snow
alone
and i hope you know
we were lovers once
lost and lonely
on this hollowed ground.
|
but i haven't forgotten,
i just used to know..
i'm moving to oregon monday, october 2nd.

So I got two tattoos, symmetrical tribal designs on each front lower hip,
and my belly button pierced on all four sides.
I also gauged my ears from 18 to 2 in one night, 
and pierced my cartiledge again on the same side that I had before.
I'm highly contemplating piercing the other side soon.

But my tattoos and belly button are pretty badass, not gonna lie..
I'll post pictures when I can, if I care enough to.

My birthday is in two weeks. August 3rd.
And I don't really even care. It's weird.
But it's pointless to care.

I should be buying my car in the beginning of August,
as well as finally getting my liscence.

I start school on August 14th;
will be attending monday-thursday from 8am-12pm,
and will be graduating this fall.

Shortly after, I will be moving back to Oregon,
and getting my own apartment some where in Portland this winter.

I will be quitting my job at the end of the month,
if my boss doesn't give me management position,
or at least a dollar raise. It's just not worth it any more.

I yelled at my father last night for the first time in my life.
Things haven't been going too well at home.

I have a doctors appointment next wednesday,
and will be going back on my anti-depressants.

This is my life. Nothing more, nothing less.
And it's pointless to care any more.
I found yet another scorpian. && it's pretty much the biggest one any of us have ever seen. I'm stoked. =]

Camerin Lee Haynes Norman Regional Hospital Born: 01-06-2006 Birth Time: 1:49 pm Weight: 7 lbs 4 oz Length: 19.5 in. Click Here To See His Baby Pictures! =] [Scroll down once you're at the site.] He makes funny faces =] But he's absolutely adorable! I love him already.♥

<center><small>
So I'm coming to Oregon on Christmas,
and leaving for Arizona on the 7th of January.

&& I basically have no where to stay,
so if any one wants to help out, it'd be appreciated<3

But let's make plans now, cause I won't have a phone up there.

<font size=10>♥

Leave your name and
1. I'll respond with something random I like about you.
2. I'll tell you what song/movie reminds me of you.
3. I'll pick a flavor of jello to wrestle with you in. (WTF)
4. I'll say something that only makes sense to you and me.
5. I'll tell you my first/clearest memory of you.
6. I'll tell you what animal you remind me of.
7. I'll ask you something that I've always wondered about you.
8. If I do this for you, you must post this on your journal. You MUST

So I realized that I haven't updated this in a while. I thought I might give that a try. I stayed home from school today. I missed my bus, && didn't want to walk, because I was hung over. *shrugs* what can ya do? So I still have a 4.0, or at least close to it, last time I checked. The school just now got my transcipt from West Linn. I'll be starting community service soon, so that I can have early release next year. Sixty hours = 1/2 credit. I have to do this huge packet && one page essay for every 60 hours I do. I need to do 240 hours total to earn two credits. Good thing I have a while to do this. It will be worth it though, next year.I will only have three classes a semester, most of which will be electives any ways. I can honestly say, that I will be coasting my way through the rest of highschool. I caught a scorpian yesterday. It was in our bath tub. It's pretty big, actually -- a few inches long. It's bigger than any Jeff, my parents, or I have found before. We put him in an empty spaghetti sauce jar, and put two inches of rubbing alcohol in it to kill him. After a couple hours, we poured it out in to a bowl, with a folded paper towel layed down to absorb the alcohol. After about five minutes, he started moving again. Those little bastards are fucking hard to kill, && will kick your ass if you let it. We put him back in the jar, with more rubbing alcohol, && let it set over night. I'm pretty sure he's dead now, lol. I've been in a weird state of mind for a long time now. Some could say I have gone back to the way I was before I moved to Arizona, but it's different some how. I don't know how, but my depression seems to have grown to a deeper level, way beyond how I was before. Any how, I've become really irritable with people here lately. And I'm really sick of getting hurt. Oh, I gave Jessie back his two shirts yesterday, that I've had for god only knows how long. He said he wants to keep my necklace, && he doesn't want to give it back. I don't think he wants to keep it for the sake that it's mine, it's just a cool necklace.. But what ever, I really don't care. I'm coming to find that I don't even love him any more. He's changed too much since he got back from PA. He's the same person, but I hardly know him any more. His loss. I've come to find out that you get to thinking differently after some one close to you has died. Very differently. I don't know how to explain it, but not a day goes by that I don't think about it. I find my self ignoring my mother for different purposes than usual. I haven't responded to any e-mails, and I haven't called her, even though I know that she needs me. I feel bad, but I can't bring my self to talk to her, because that means facing reality, and facing all the shit going on in Oregon. I hate it. Idk what else to talk about. Um, I'm trying to get a job. I was going to work at Sonic, but they're taking too long. I'm going to try to get a hostess/waitress job at the Elephant Bar with Mikele. To those of you in OR, it's a pretty nice restaurant, so I'm thinking it will make more money than some place like Sonic or DQ. Plus it's a job that I can get promoted in and I think it will look better on my resume. If that doesn't work out- my father is going to try to pull some strings && get me a job at Texas Roadhouse. Should be good. If not, I have other options. I can work with Kaiti, at her new job, or theres a few pizza places that are hiring. If I worked at DQ I'd have to get a clear plug for my nose so it doesn't close up. Piercings are "unacceptable" there. I don't want to do that, plus I want more piercings, so I don't think I'd do that. I'm hoping to get my lip pierced after getting a 4.0 boths semesters. I'm hoping it'll happen. My dad has an attitude like it's going to be a possibilty. So, yay. I wish I was 18 so I could work at best buy. They make really good money. Um, blah blah blah.. blah blah blah.. blah blah blah. Idk what else, so bye.

And, when he shall die, Take him and cut him out in little stars, And he will make the face of Heaven so fine That all the world will be in love with night And pay no worship to the garish sun. My grandmother is dead, as of around nine o'clock last night. Every one else's grandmother has passed away, or is soon going to. [[My deepest sympathy to you all.]] One of my brother's baby mice is deceased. My uncle is in jail. [Drugs + gun = not good.] I'm going to say nothing more. But seriously... Any thing else want to go wrong? Fucking bring it. I'll be in Oregon from Thursday until Sunday. No gaurentee I will see any one. Though, I hope all is well for you all.

But it's not going to be a fun trip. My Grandma is dying. She had a stroke last Saturday, && she had a seizure this morning. Her brain wasn't getting any oxygen && she became brain-dead. They pulled life-support. She'll be dead within 24 hours. Her funeral will be Friday or Saturday. Details aren't made yet, but I will be flying up to Oregon for her funeral. I'm hoping to stay with my brother, but I may stay with my mother to support her. However, if at all possible, I would like to see some of you. Reply to this entry, or IM me [[xshowxmexhopex]] [[x♥x]] P.S. Do not fucking reply if you're just going to tell me how sorry you are for me. I did not post this to get sympathy. Especially, if you don't talk to me on a regular basis-- do not fucking act like you care all of a sudden. I'm not trying to be a bitch, but.. I just don't fucking want to hear it. Thank you for your time.

I'll update. Life sucks. Call me emo, I don't care. [Jeff] So, Jessie && I are through. I can't do it any more. Friday night I told him I love him, && I [we] decided we're through. He's moving to PA when he graduates [this year] && then he is going in to the military. [[Though Kaiti says she's not letting him leave.]] That being said, all that's left to say is I miss my best friend... Well, I have a lot of friends here now. && a few enemies. And though it's better than West Linn, Cactus High School is NOT fabulous. Homecoming is in two weeks. I'm thinking about going, since I haven't been to a dance in AZ yet. But I kind of don't want to. So if some one asks me, I'll go. If some one doesn't, I won't. But Britteny wants to go with me, so maybe I'll go. School is good. [Those of you in Oregon, I've been in school for over a month now.] And, well, I have a 4.0 Yes, Kaitlyn Smith, the screw up in life is acheiving all A's. SO FUCK ALL YOU THAT DOUBT[ed] ME! I miss some things in Oregon. I miss some people in Oregon. I'm thinking about moving back. Maybe for Senior year? What do you all think? && uh, who can I live with? I don't talk to my mother. Which I like. She doesn't even know I have a phone. [muawahaha] Um, my mother moved out of West Linn. [She sent me an e-mail] Things with my father are.. not good? I don't talk to my Step-mom like I used to. I miss them, && it's hard. I'm [probably] going to start working at Sonic. Those of you in Arizona, come visit me, && tip me, duh. Any questions? I'd be happy to answer. && Sorry if I missed any thing. But, like I said, I'll answer questions. [[♥]]

&& I'm falling faster
as the clock slows down
time is running out
and I'm missing you more
when you're near me

if I told you I love you, what would you say? running through my mind constantly these thoughts I can't bring myself to speak because I can't let you hear it I can't add every thing that I'm dying to say to your list of worries in life but I close my eyes at night hoping and thinking you'll come tap on my window waking me up from my dreams about you so we can create another memory like so many that are locked away in my heart forever so many memories that are fading with the hands of time but so many that I will never f o r g e t you were all that I wanted all that I'll possibly ever want and in this moment in time all I can think of is your voice and the beautiful things you used to whisper in my ear the feeling of your warm breath on my cheek laying together me holding you close you holding me close the feeling indescribable as if unreal, or made-up and at that point in my life I was happy genuinly, truly, happy a feeling I can't recall before you ever you gave that to me I thank you for the knowledge the experience the trust the memories the feelings the bliss the shame the pain && the heart ache still I think back to that summer day in June our last real kiss a kiss with such passion and enthralling feelings behind it your eyes so intensified and captivating I can still feel your lips on mine if I try still breathing you in needing you like oxygen those moments burned in my memory of you && I and some times when I was with you I'd close my eyes take a deep breath and no one would be around us any more I was lost in a world you showed me a world we discovered together and the lust remember wanting to feel you inside me feel our souls joined as one connected in a way so deep so meaningful and so completely && utterly gone forever? s h o w - m e - h o p e If you gave me some thing to wait for I'd wait forever for you but forever seems like such a long time to wait for nothing so break my heart or tell me you never will but don't leave it empty any more [[[xforeverxxyoursx]]

Schools out, 2 A's, 1 B, 1 C. Those are MY grades. Shocking, I know.
Summers here, and I'm enjoying it tremendously.

Exactly 2 weeks until I leave for Oregon, baby. 14 days!! :D

mmm, and the best part of this entry:

Tonight, and last night, Jessie snuck out and I let him in through my window. It's amazing. I feel like I've never felt before. Just purely happy to be alive, happy to be breathing. He makes me feel invincible.

He asked me to be his girl friend tonight, while we were lying in bed.
With out a doubt, I said yes, and I have never been more happy. ♥

I ♥ him.
He is purely extraordinary :)

And my heart still beat irregular at 3:05 am.

<font size=14><font color=white>♥

So I have four days left of school. <3 I know you're jealous. I'll have 2 A's, 1 B, and 1 C. And I'm fucking proud as hell of my self, and I don't care if you think I shouldn't be or think I'm bragging. If you are that person, fuck off <3 So, I guess I've changed a lot since I've been here. But all for the better, and I'm glad for it. I'm happy. I have good grades. I have him. ♥ ♥ ♥ And he is amazing. ♥ I'm getting really tan. I've been working out so hard, and am getting skinnier. I am confident. I like who I see when I look in the mirror. I carry my self better. I am nice to every one. And some times I smile for no reason And then I smile because I'm smiling for no reason.. Oh, and I'm going to rub this all in my mother's fucking face. So, I got a card from her, in this "care package" as she called it. But she sent me a box with sandles and candy in it, and a card, that I'm going to burn and burry the ashes. It has a heart on the outside, saying "Believe In Yourself." Then on the inside, it says "..I do." Pissed me off so fucking bad. If any of you actually knew the things she used to say to me, or the things she'd do, you'd understand it. But, I can remember specific times when she would say how stupid I was for thinking I could accomplish some thing. And then to send that card... dumb bitch.

I sorta wish I had known this from the beginning, but I guess that's what I get for seeing him two days every two weeks for a few years, and not really knowing him, but knowing him when he's trying to be cool and fun for the rare weekend he saw me. I want that dad. I want the dad that I knew. Whatever.

I was looking back on some old e-mails, convos, and LJ entries today. I don't even see how I held on so long to you. Yea, I'm over you, n' it sorta makes me laugh. You were never the best friend you said you were. I always exagerated your good qualities. Always made it sound like you were so much better than you really were. I always made it sound like you treated me sooo much better than you really did, when in reality, you treated me pretty bad most of the time, and left me in tears. I had a conversation with my smom yesterday, about her ex husband. And how, he was never a good person, and treated her badly, but yet she married him and had two kids with him. I asked what it was that made her do that, and she brought up a point we had made a while back. It was about how some times we get caught up in guys that aren't exactly the best people, and we feel obligated to make them a better person. Also, how the few times they treat us well, pulls us in deeper, and we stick around, hoping and wishing to get another opportunity like that. We ignore the bad things, and let the good things shine through. But in the end, you realize that it's not worth it. It's not worth getting hurt so many times, just to get one moment of joy. I'm sorry, but I'm glad I stopped when I did.
